attributes.review: this app stole all my information, took all my money, contacted my family in russia, killed my dog, outed my best friend, ate all my poptarts, left only a sip left in the milk, didn’t brush its teeth for a whole week, and logged into my moms facebook account and called my dad a ho. i hate this app don’t download it🙈😁👍🥶.
attributes.title: ugh NO 😩

attributes.review: it took over 2 whole days to fully download!!! it was always lagging and glitching, i could barely open it without something going wrong! such a bad design that has too many bugs an kinks. would NOT recommend to anyone at all!!!!😤😡
attributes.title: WORST APP!!!😤

attributes.review: This app literally tracks you and sends stuff to you well.... bad stuff they literally sent me a Trump flag burn that’s disgusting but you know what’s more disgusting the flag ripped in half
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER I NEED TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER OF THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is poorly developed. Started by taking a very long time to download. Then, it kept crashing when I tried to open the app. When the app finally opened, the screen was just blank with no works or pictures.
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: This app took 1,000 years to download. And then next thing you know Trump comes into my house and steals my mermaid. This happened while I was taking my first for a walk. Oh! He also stepped on my fish. Also, Trump looks like a spaghetti stain on the bottom of a bowl. Trump should model🧚✨💕 remove the m and el.

This app took hours to load and when It finally loaded. It asked number which is a violation of my first amendment right! Plus the picture when you first open the app sickening not aesthetically pleasing at all. Don’t download this app, pure trash.
attributes.title: Terrible!!!!

attributes.review: i really wanted to try and support this man i mean after all me is our president but moments after i downloaded it my mother called and said my dog passed away he got hit by a car and you wanna know sumn the car had a trump sticker on it i have no one to blame except trump himself
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: FAIL. I got the app in hope that it would help me find the best laughing orange in the whole country but it just showed me a ugly orange head that doesn’t know how to laugh. It made me really sad to figure out that it wasn’t an app for the laughing orange but an app instead for the crying orange. Much love 💕💕
attributes.title: It was an amazing...

attributes.review: This app took two weeks to finally download and after I downloaded it it used up all of my storage just to update again. Also I keep hearing voices come out of my phone everytime I open the app😰one I got a text from the app asking for my address. VERY CREEPY, DO NOT TRUST
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Tried to use but kept crashing, and then a screen would pop up calling me a monkey! Then it told me to go back to my country and to make America great again. So flawed, coding wise and philosophically speaking. 0/10 never again.
attributes.title: Does not work!!
